backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a café billing system defining types (MenuItem, OrderItem, FinalizedOrder, etc.), initializing menu/category/order data structures, and mixing in access control authorization. Contains a full hardcoded menu dataset and order management logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the Order tab navigation fix (active route highlight and /order routing) is implemented in OrderTaking.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering hooks, components, utilities, and layout files for the café billing React app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Café Billing & Menu Manager app, mounting the React app at #root and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining all app routes (/, /menu, /menu-management, /order, /bill, /reports, /order-details) under a root layout, with an index redirect to /order.
frontend/src/components/bill/BillItemsTa: Receipt-style table component rendering bill line items with name, quantity, unit price, and line total using bigint-typed ActiveOrderItem and formatCurrency.
Print-optimized receipt layout component displaying café logo, order metadata, itemized BillItemsTable, subtotal/discount/total, and a footer message; accepts bigint-typed financial props.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component with a sticky header showing the café logo, Internet Identity auth button, role badge (Admin/Viewer), and an admin-only Menu Management link, plus a bottom Navigation bar and Outlet for child routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navigatio: Fixed bottom tab bar with Order, Menu, and Reports tabs using TanStack Router Link and useRouterState for active route highlighting with 64px tap targets.
frontend/src/components/menu/DeleteMenuI: An alert dialog component that prompts the user to confirm deletion of a menu item by name, with a loading state and destructive action button.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuCategor: Renders a grouped list of menu items under a category header, with inline edit (dialog) and delete (alert dialog) controls visible to admins.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemFor: A reusable form for creating or editing a menu item with name, price, and category fields, supporting both preset and custom categories fetched from the backend.
frontend/src/components/order-details/Or: Displays a finalized order's details including an items table with quantities and prices, plus a totals footer showing subtotal, optional discount, and grand total.
frontend/src/components/order/CategoryGr: Renders a grid of menu categories with emoji icons and gradient backgrounds, mapping known category names to visual styles and falling back to rotating gradients for custom ones.
frontend/src/components/order/CategoryIt: Shows a filterable grid of menu items within a selected category, with a back button, optional search input, and per-item quantity display via MenuItemCard.
frontend/src/components/order/DeleteOrde: An alert dialog that confirms deletion of the current order, displaying the item count and showing a loading spinner on the destructive action button.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuCatego: Collapsible accordion component that groups menu items by category, auto-expands when a search filter is active, and renders each item via MenuItemCard.
frontend/src/components/order/MenuItemCa: Card component displaying a single menu item's name, price, and current order quantity, with a click handler to add it to the order.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderItemR: Row component for a single order line item showing name, unit price, quantity controls (increment/decrement), line total, and a remove button.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderSumma: Panel that renders a list of OrderItemRow components for all active order items, returning null when the order is empty.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderTotal: Displays order subtotal, discount controls (flat or percentage), discount amount, and final total with input for discount value.
frontend/src/components/reports/DailySum: Two-card grid showing today's revenue and items sold, with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateRang: Date range filter UI with start/end date inputs and an apply button for filtering report data.
frontend/src/components/reports/DateWise: Table component that aggregates finalized orders and daily sales data into per-date rows showing bill count and total sales, with a grand total footer.
frontend/src/components/reports/ItemWise: Table displaying per-item sales data including item name, quantity sold, and revenue, with loading skeleton and empty state.
frontend/src/components/reports/MonthlyS: Table showing monthly sales totals sorted chronologically, converting backend nanosecond-based month indices to human-readable month/year labels, with a grand total footer.
frontend/src/components/reports/Previous: Displays a card showing the previous day's total revenue and bill count, with loading skeletons and an empty state when no orders were placed.
frontend/src/data/publicMenu.ts: Defines the static public-facing menu data as typed categories (Tea, Coffee, Momos, etc.) with item names and prices in rupees.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, initializing it with the user's Internet Identity and an admin token, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRole.ts: Queries the backend to determine if the currently authenticated user has admin privileges, returning an isAdmin boolean and loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderState.ts: Manages local order state including items, quantities, discount (flat or percentage), and derived totals, exposing add/update/remove/clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks and mutations for menu items, categories, orders, and sales data, along with category ordering/display-name utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a warm café-themed light/dark color palette, and includes print styles and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module providing helpers for class merging (cn), currency/date formatting, nanosecond conversion, and menu category ordering/display-name mapping.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BillView.tsx: Page component that reads bill data from sessionStorage, parses it, and renders a printable bill layout with navigation controls for printing or starting a new order.
frontend/src/pages/MenuManagement.tsx: Admin page for managing the café menu, supporting adding, editing, and deleting menu items and categories via dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetails.tsx: Page that fetches and displays all finalized orders in reverse chronological order, with authentication gating and loading skeleton states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTaking.tsx: Main order-taking page that renders a static menu by category, manages cart state via useOrderState, and finalizes orders by calling the backend mutation then navigating to a bill page.
frontend/src/pages/PublicMenu.tsx: Public-facing menu display page with category filter pills and a scrollable list of items with prices, requiring no authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SalesReports.tsx: Authenticated sales reports page showing daily, item-wise, and monthly sales data in tabs, with a refresh button and a login-required guard for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, using sessionStorage for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom café-themed colors (espresso, latte, cream, amber), fonts, border radii, shadows, and animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version, known issues (Order tab not navigating), and existing fix feature requests for the bottom navigation bar.
